parameters.label: organization-defined interior points within the system

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Analyze outbound communications traffic at external interfaces to the system and at the following interior points to detect covert exfiltration of information: {{ si-4.18_prm_1 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Organization-defined interior points include subnetworks and subsystems. Covert means that can be used to exfiltrate information include steganography.
